website_summaries.verdict: The throw-back style of this unique watch won't appeal to everyone; but it's a fun and attractive look for those who still like elements of 1980s fashion trends.
pros: This retro-looking watch stands out from the usual, thanks to the square dial and digital display that is reminiscent of timepieces from the 1980s
Feels fairly lightweight and comfortable on the wrist
cons: The buttons are stiff and difficult to push
The vintage design isn't for those who prefer contemporary styles

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it looks cool, but small for a dude.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, smaller than I thought? And the buttons barely work, I can't change the day, or date. But time I could.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Retro
customer_reviews.text: Nixon keeps producing stunning designs. This one has a nice retro look that surely catches lots of eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I love the display
customer_reviews.text: I wear this every day. I love the display, easy to read, and the light is very convenient. I had to stop wearing it to work though because my job is too rough for it. I must make one comment though, I was very disappointed when I figured out that I couldn't change the watch strap. The metal scratches my wrist and has the potential to scratch other surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my boyfriend and we both absolutely love it! It alludes the perfect old school vibe ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend and we both absolutely love it! It alludes the perfect old school vibe that is guaranteed to satisfy all of your nostalgic desires. The back light is dim but it is still a rad looking piece of "jewelry". If your're in to the old school 80's style watches, I can speak for both of us, we highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Gold Nixon
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Its comfortable and it compliments my attire perfectly. The reason I gave it four stars instead of five is due to its latch. I have the sneaking suspicion that I'm going to loose this watch at some point.....Note: If the watch comes undone and falls off of your wrist you need to adjust the band length and make it a little shorter so that the watch is tighter on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: SevenUrsa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a loyal watch... had it for a good 4-5 years and wore it everyday. Got so many compliments over these years. I recently left it by the pool when swimming and went back to go get it and it was gone :( .. perfect watch
customer_reviews.author: Tomas T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch for Ladies Too
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this watch! I know it’s “for men” but I have been wanting one for awhile and finally got it and do not regret it. Retro style, and I like watches that have the date as well as time. Easy to remove links, as I had to make it much smaller to fit my wrist. Will likely buy in other colors too :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Fits girls too, got it as a gift for a girlfriend! (:
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend as a present, it fits her tiny wrist well! I thought it was gonna look huge but it doesn’t, and if you have a bigger wrist it still might fit you good, the style of watch it is is universal w bigger wrists too. It’s a modern twist on a classic type of watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this watch. I really wanted it. But when I got it it just seemed so cheap. It was light and felt cheap. It felt like I was holding a $15 watch. It was light and thin and seemed low end. Not nearly as nice as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Takes me back to the days when LCD watches first came out. It's very stylish and very comfortable. I've noticed some reviews have stated that the buttons were difficult to operate but I have not had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Engler

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for two months, must not be waterproof. Got it lightly wet in usual everyday use. After two months it randomly spazzed out and glitched. Screen went black, replaced the battery to try to fix it. No luck, pay for what you get I guess. Disappointment I really loved this watch, got so many complements.
customer_reviews.author: Ari898

customer_reviews.title: Loving this watch, so far
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this watch. I’ve worn it everyday since I received it 2 weeks ago. Time will tell (no pun intended) how it holds up. It is experiencing some discoloration on the band that sits under the clip. This is due to friction and I assume it should be expected. Doesn’t show anyway. All in all, I’m thoroughly enjoying this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks for nice for whatever occasion wether if you wanna dress up or go for a casual look this watch goes either way. And it’s cheaper to get it here on amazon than the actual Nixon website. Highly recommend 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great nixon watch, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift. Friend loves it, would definitely buy more. Arrived sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Love how it adjust because her arm ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves this watch but now it's digital numbers are glitzing so I need to have it looked at. Beautiful watch. Love how it adjust because her arm is tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hinson

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFFS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake nixon!! Really poor craftsmanship I dont even think its stainless steal, feels like plastic. None of it looks like the brushed finish that I've seen in person on this watch or the stock image in their own ad, its like shiny plastic garbage, I'm appalled that this product is being sold as genuine, this merchant should be fined and shamed.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read the time
customer_reviews.text: Buttons were very hard to push in, and the back light is the only time you can really see what time it is in certain conditions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read TIme
customer_reviews.text: The face is too dark, making it hard to read the time.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working about a month after I got it. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it! He’s made it his every day watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Camara

customer_reviews.title: Just what I "wasn't" looking for
customer_reviews.text: It does the job slim and stylish it got mistaken for a smart watch a couple times😂, I really enjoy it don't really use the other functions so i don't use the buttons maybe should of gotten the dial one but eh . Love it any ways
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch. It is such an attention grabber. People are shocked when I tell them it was not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: epytehcra

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.text: Super rad watch for the price. Easy to adjust the band size with the included tool.
customer_reviews.author: Slalom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Original review: I just got my re-run. It's a simple, no-nonsense digital watch. Not bulky like some others, very comfortable to wear, and feels well constructed. I had no trouble adjusting the clip to resize the band. The styling is simple and clean. The only very slight disappointment was how difficult it is to press the buttons. It did make it harder than I would have liked to set up, but that's not really an ongoing problem. 8 months later: The buttons gave out. Now if I try to change the time, the whole watch resets, making it virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my watch! Price is absolutely better than the $125 Nixon charges on their website
customer_reviews.author: Cristina DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This Watch broke very easily? Any recommendations of where to fix it? I got it in August and it was worn only on occasion and broke last month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s something to buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking watch although the clip to hold it is not very good it takes of by itself
customer_reviews.author: Emily Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I wear it all the time. I feel like it works for casual outfits, but fits in with a more dressed up look too. Nixon is th'best.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Easy to use and looks great on my significant other!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This is junk. The damn buttons don't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: Detail in display
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and there is somethibg wrong with the display, it shows one digit number incomplete, it should say 6-20, definetely want a refund for this
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: It was nice for about a month and then it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Bowmer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t lie to people
customer_reviews.text: It said it was stainless-still and it was NOT, making omg not worth the amout I pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Navarro

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite watch to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I get so many compliments. I'm a hairdresser and I'm constantly washing hair and I don't have to take it off everytime. It's adjustable so you don't have to take it in to fit your wrist. Sometimes my son will wear my silver one and he can adjust it to his wrist size. I definitely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: 615sd

customer_reviews.title: 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch very fly on wrist. Gotta have drip to rock this joint.
customer_reviews.author: Tyreese718

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my sister she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome and I got it very fast it looks great especially for people with skinny wrists. Also the band is extremely easy to adjust look up the video on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Looks great. However the band seems to come unclasped every so often. Still a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Would be a five if the buttons were not so difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Deb3677

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking you can adjust without having to cut it
customer_reviews.author: paola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch people who wrote a bad review on this watch are crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Titletown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful watch. Looks good on whatever style you choose to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Reyes Calbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch for anyone that is not a big fan of traditional dial watches or the gigantic sport watches. This watch is perfect for the casual/business attire; it nice without any flash. The watch is simple and doesn't look like a alien designed it like some other digital dress watches. Also the watch is thin, meaning it wont get caught on those long sleeve dress shirts. It has an easy to read digital readout with all the necessary stuff for a basic watch. To put it simply, the thing looks great on your wrist!
customer_reviews.author: Public

customer_reviews.title: Just Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Literally fell to pieces within a year. It also resets itself constantly because the buttons were sensitive. Look elsewhere for a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Centeno

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect gift for my man
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for it to get where it needed to be but my man loved it and it was very securely wrapped like 5 times lol
customer_reviews.author: Anna Creasman

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Nixon!! Watch is super light and looks great!! My wrist is pretty skinny so I love that u can adjust the belt on it to get the right fit for you! Also came in 3 days!! Completely satisfied!!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my boyfriend , he loves it!!! slick design, not bulky like other watches. 2 years later the watch is still working fine. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mz

customer_reviews.title: I love how sleek and timeless the design is
customer_reviews.text: I love how sleek and timeless the design is. My only concern is that it's hard to adjust the date and time. I had to take it to the watchmaker to set it for me.
customer_reviews.author: anna kristina gonzales abad

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch and seems to be of good quality so far, get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Salman Shafi

customer_reviews.title: OK?  Not OK!
customer_reviews.text: (The watch looks good. If the operation or appearance changes I'll reply again.) OK, I'm Back with more Information! This costs way too much. Now the issue, the band is very CHEAP and will break, latch won't work either... I bought it in July, so that's been 3 months. The watch still runs... however what good is the watch without the matching band. I'll have to change my mind on this "5" stars to "1" star. What you buy is you decision, however I Do Not recommend this watch...
customer_reviews.author: B+Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Purchased for my son, its just what we hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! As described, comfortable to wear and is easily adjusted to wrist size.
customer_reviews.author: GRA

customer_reviews.title: nice size, good material and it last so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifull, nice size, good material and it last so far (after 2 years of use)
customer_reviews.author: Diogo E.

customer_reviews.title: not what i ordered!
customer_reviews.text: the face of the watch where the numbers are is dark green not black. this is not what i ordered.it doesn't look like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Louise Silnik

customer_reviews.title: this watch is dope.
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for a new digital watch after deciding it was time to retire my casio and this watch is an awesome upgrade. sizing the band properly was a little tricky from looking at the diagram, but other than that i love it.
customer_reviews.author: zephyr jones

product_meta.title: Nixon Re-Run A158. 100m Water Resistant Men’s Digital Watch (38.5mm Digital Watch Face. 13-18mm Stainless Steel Band)
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 7.52 Ounces
 * Item model number :A158502
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :October 1, 2001
 * Manufacturer :Nixon Inc.
 * ASIN :B003VWAJ8C

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #144,187 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #886 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #27 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars231 ratings
feature_bullets: RE-RUN, GOLD/BLACK. A nostalgic-inspired 80s Nixon design, the gold and black 38.5mm Re-Run is an all-digital allstar smart watch that combines a digital face with a jewelry style band.

CALCULATOR SMARTS. Reminiscent of an old calculator, the Re-Run offers a calendar, alarm, dual time, countdown capabilities, and light on a negative display LCD dial. Stay in the know with this timeless classic.
MOD THROWBACK. The Re-Run watch features throwback curves and contours adding retro appeal to a digital functionality. Polyurethane pushers on the front will navigate you through modes.
FUELED BY ADVENTURES. We deliver products that meet your needs in various high-intensity work and play environments, whether it’s across the globe or close to home.
FOR A LIFE WELL LIVED. Through our dedicated teams perspectives, we contribute to a single unified expression: team-designed, custom-built accessories. For a life well-lived.
